info.title: (DO NOT DELETE) Polygon Rewards API v2

200.description: A rewards result set with metadata.

items.description: The account that received the reward. This is a checksummed ethereum address including lower case and capital letters.

validator.description: The "owner address" of the validator which distributed the rewards.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the end of the checkpoint.

items.description: The formula to compute the final rewards in the currency unit is numeric x 10^(-exp).

text.description: The textual version of the other fields in the rewards object.
The textual version of the other fields in the balances object.

exp.description: The exponent used to calculate the final MATIC amount.

network.description: The name of the network queried.

start.description: Either checkpoint (number) or timestamps (strings formatted like "YYYY-MM-DD").

end.description: Either checkpoint (number) or timestamps (strings formatted like "YYYY-MM-DD").
